title: getting booted from a ranked game then losing Lp for it
body: i just had a game as volibear and i was kicked from the server. i was doing alright and we were smashing the other team. when i rejoin the match the game had finished and i lost Lp. could u reimburse me or do something to help me out?

replies.body: Unfortunately, LP will not be reimbursed if the system has detected you as having 'left' the game, even if you rejoin. This is intentional.
